name: Air Fryer Gluten-Free Fried Chicken
author: WallerWife
summary: This is a simple air fryer recipe in the Midwestern style of using cracker crumb breading, but without gluten for those who do not include gluten in their diet.
ingredients: salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
2 pounds boneless, skinless chicken breast, cut in 1-inch pieces
directions: Whisk eggs in a shallow bowl and season with salt and pepper
Place flour in a second bowl and cracker crumbs in a third bowl
Dredge chicken pieces first in flour, then in eggs, and finally in cracker crumbs
Place on an air fryer rack, making sure pieces don't touch
Brush tops of chicken with oil
Air fry chicken at 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) until cooked through and crisp, about 10 minutes
